lines: Living in the night, 'Neath devils, torn asunder, You call on me To solve a crooked rhyme
As I'm closing in - Imposing on your slumber - You call on me, As bells begin to chime
Are you on the square?
Are you on the level?
Are you ready to swear right here, right now, Before the devil?
Hiding from the light - Sacrificing nothing - Still, you call on me, For entrance to the shrine
Hammering the nails Into a sacred coffin - You call on me, For powers clandestine
Ring a ring of roses, a pocket full of posies
atichoo, atichoo, we all fall down...
Ashes in the water, ashes in the sea. Ashes on the riverside, one, two, three...
In times of turmoil - In times like these - Beliefs contagious - Spreading disease
This wretched mischief is now coursing through your souls, never to let go
THEM RATS!
Rats! OOUUAAAAHAAAA
In to your sanctum, you let them in. Now all your loved ones, and all your kin will suffer punishments beneath the wrath of God
Never to forgive, never to forget
This devastation left your cities to be burnt, never to return
And filthy rodents are still coming for your souls, never to let go
They're still coming after you
There's nothing you can do
There is a scourge in the guise of sanctity, a perpetrator with a quill
Although it's... often steeped in well spun mystery
The accuser sends a bill
I am all eyes
I am all ears
I am the wall, and I'm watching you fall
Because faith. Is. Mine
The Luddites shun the diabolical, A fecal trail across the land
Although it... Stinks, feels and looks identical
A pack of fools can take the stand
Many  a sin I have witnessed
And in many a deed I have been
Many a rat I have befriended, and in many a thorn stood between
But of all the demons I've known, none could compare to you
Every day that you feed me with hate, I grow stronger
Drink me, eat me, then you'll see the light
You will see the light
Many a mind I have haunted, and in many a way I have been
Often the one to have flaunted an image, grotesque and obscene
But of all the dark roads that I roam, none could compare to you
ðŸŽ· ðŸŽ· ðŸŽ· TOOT ðŸŽ· ðŸŽ· ðŸŽ·
You'll soon be hearing the chimes, close to midnight
If i could turn back the time, I'd make all right
How could it end like this?
There's a sting in the way you kiss me
Something within your eyes said it could be the last time, 'fore it's over
Just wanna be, wanna bewitch you in the moonlight
Just wanna be, wanna bewitch you all night
It keeps on giving me chills, but I know now
I feel the closer we get, to the last bow
I donâ€™t wanna end like this, But there's a sting in the way you kiss me
Just wanna be, I wanna bewitch you one last time in the ancient rite
Lucifer, whispering, silently into your mind. Who walks behind, who walks behind
Standing tall, invincible, but do not forget your knives. To save your lives, to save your lives
Don't you forget about dying
Don't you forget about your friend death
Don't you forget that you will die
Donâ€™t you vomit savage slurs, spewed up wickedly. To hide from me, to hide from me
Navigate all alone, on this tempestuous sea. To ride with me, to ride with me
You have never stood this close, to where you want to be
You have always waded in the shallows, between me and the deep blue sea
You would never want me to appear, you never want this to be over. You never want it to reach out to the edge of time
While you sleep in earthly delight, someone's flesh is rotting tonight
Like no other to you, what you have done, you can not undo
I have always kept you closer than you have known
I am riding in the shadows behind you, on a pale white horse
While you sleep in earthly delight, still your soul will suffer this plight. Like your father in hell, what you've sold you can not unsell
While you sleep in earthly delight, still your soul will suffer this plight. Like a mother would save her own child from digging a grave
Can you hear me say your name forever?
Can you feel me longing for you forever?
Would you let me touch your soul forever?
I know the light grows darker down below, but in your eyes it is gone before you know
This is the moment of just letting go
She said, if you had life eternal...
We dance once more, I feel your hands are cold. Within your heart, a story to be told
Forever... if you had life eternal?
